item.description:
ONE of you will meet Ron Paul...

We will be having the drawing of the Ron Paul lottery at Faneuil Hall @ 7:00 this evening.

All that is required is one person, that has not donated, to be present to be an independent moderator.

Though not part of this event (and you feel inspired) bring signs, literature and we can also spread the message of Ron Paul while we are at it.

My Cellphone: 608-469-3932 and I'll be in the front of the hall

ADDITION: I attached a spreadsheet that gives the amount and number of "tickets" that each individual received.

PLEASE contact me ASAP, if you have any reason to believe there is some nefarious fixing of the lottery. We can reschedule ASAP - by mid-afternoon at the latest.
item.name: Ron Paul Lottery
